Articles.Content:
Hi all.

I was flying on Ike in the making of my first Ksp video.

All of a sudden, I smashed into a hill.

I have four backup saves automatically loaded (I forgot to Quicksave).

Which one should I chose to load?:

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mJU4gO7.png[/IMG]

Thank you everyone!

[COLOR=silver][SIZE=1]- - - Updated - - -[/SIZE][/COLOR]

Oh, the quick save I want is the one before the final one.

(If the final one saved like that). Edited November 23, 2015 by DMSP

Last one is the most recent.
Format is: "zKACBACKUP" + year + month + day + hours + minutes + seconds + "-persistent"
Last one is 4 days old though...

[quote name='Gaarst']Last one is the most recent.
Format is: "zKACBACKUP" + year + month + day + hours + minutes + seconds + "-persistent"
Last one is 4 days old though...[/QUOTE]

I know...

Oh well, I'll be naughty and Hyperedit the Ship and lander in!

Thank you for helping, this will be good to know later on!
